rules_text:
Vigilance
When Mikkino enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{4}{G}{W}: Create Azos's Spine, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +4/+4,” “Whenever equipped creature attacks, exile target permanent defending player controls,” and equip {5}. Attach it to Mikkino.
